handleNewRun

public void handleNewRun(RunInfoAndFiles run)
Each time a new run is submitted to a PC2 Server this method is called passing run information and files to this method.

Note: one can extract the files from RunInfoAndFiles using RunInfoAndFiles.writeUserFile(int,String) .

Overrides:
handleNewRun in class ScoreboardClient
Following copied from class: pc2.ex.BaseClient
See Also:
RunInfoAndFiles, handleNewRun
